note: Out (Suspension) - Bridges is serving a 30-game suspension for an off-court incident.
Out For Season (Knee) - Ball will miss the 2023-24 season while recovering from surgery.
Out Indefinitely (Personal) - Rubio is away from the team due to a mental health matter, he will miss an undetermined length of time.
Out Indefinitely (Knee) - The Nuggets announced that Cancar underwent surgery on his left knee and is out indefinitely.
Day To Day (Possible suspension) - Porter Jr. is questionable for the season opener while facing possible suspension from an off-court incident.
Day To Day (Possible suspension) - Coffey is questionable for the season opener due to a possible league discipline for an alleged off-court incident.
Out (Suspension) - Morant is serving a 25-game suspension for conduct detrimental to the league.
Out (Achilles) - Clark is idle due to a right Achilles issue, and is not expected to make his season debut until sometime in February.
Out (Knee) - The Pelicans announced that Murphy III will return to basketball activities in approximately 10-12 weeks.
Out Indefinitely (Knee) - Harrell underwent an MRI that revealed a torn ACL and meniscus, according to Shams Charania of The Athletic.
Out (Suspension) - Graham is serving a two-game suspension for an off-court incident.
